paragraph.heading: 1System Information Page
paragraph.paragraph: This page allows you to enter the class names used in the generated system.
paragraph.heading: 2Settings
3Application name
paragraph.paragraph: This is the class name used for the custom application class generated by the wizard. This class inherits EV_APPLICATION and will launch the GUI window that was designed with the wizard.
paragraph.heading: 3Window class name
paragraph.paragraph: This is the name used by the wizard when generating the GUI window.
